div.p: The MarkLogic Connector for Hadoop combines the power of Hadoop for batch processing with the real-time analytics that MarkLogic Server provides for Big Data.
The MarkLogic Connector for Hadoop is a drop-in extension to Hadoop that allows users to run Hadoop MapReduce jobs on data in a MarkLogic Server cluster.

ul.li: Built-in input and output formats to read data from a MarkLogic database
